## Document() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Renders an editor for an Edtr.io document

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function Document<K extends string = string>({ scope, ...props }: Omit<EditorProps<K>, 'initialState'> & {
    scope: string;
} & ({
    mirror: true;
    initialState?: unknown;
} | {
    mirror?: false;
    initialState: EditorProps<K>['initialState'];
})): JSX.Element | null;
```

|  { scope, ...props } | <code>Omit&lt;EditorProps&lt;K&gt;, 'initialState'&gt; &amp; {</code><br/><code>    scope: string;</code><br/><code>} &amp; ({</code><br/><code>    mirror: true;</code><br/><code>    initialState?: unknown;</code><br/><code>} &#124; {</code><br/><code>    mirror?: false;</code><br/><code>    initialState: EditorProps&lt;K&gt;['initialState'];</code><br/><code>})</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`JSX.Element | null`
